doc.title: Colored Invincibles
doc.plot: "Here is the famous colored troop, the so-called immunes, who went away to fight with as much zeal as their white brothers. The boys look well, and from appearances stood the strain in splendid form. This is one of the scenes where the colored man is accepted as a brother in arms, for his work in the field was equal, if not superior at times, to his white companions'. A very fine picture
